GPUs Text.desc: A description of the GPUs in use

Status Text.desc: Color coded status icon and text

ETA.desc: Estimated time to Work Unit completion

Assign Time.desc: Work Unit assignment time in UTC

Number.desc: Work Unit number assigned by the machine it's on

Work Server.desc: Work Server that assigned the Work Unit

gpu_clock.desc: The current GPU graphics clock speed, in MHz.

gpu_temp.desc: The current GPU core temperature, in degrees Celsius.

mem_clock.desc: The current GPU memory clock speed, in MHz.

gpu_power.desc: The current GPU board power draw over the maximum power limit, in Watts.

gpu_fans.desc: The current fan speed for each independently addressable fan as a percent of the maximum accoding to the current noise profile.

gpu_pcie_max.desc: The system maximum GPU PCIe generation and link width. Limited based on the maximum of the GPU, motherboard, and CPU.

gpu_pcie_cur.desc: The current GPU PCIe link generation and width.
